= How to install Apache Ivy Database Dependencies Plugin =

This page is dedicated to show how to install Apache Ivy Database Dependencies Plugin. 

==Database creation==
Download and execute with a SQL client a script to create dbdep database, for MySQL you can execute [http://ivy-dbdep-ant-task.googlecode.com/files/setup_db.sql setup_db.sql] (you can find it in the plugin package distribution too).

==Add all the dependencies on your Ant classpath==

Add to you Ant classpath all the dependencies included in [http://ivy-dbdep-ant-task.googlecode.com/files/ivy-dbdep-ant-task-0.2-with-dependencies.zip dbdep with-dependencies package]

==Configure your own Apache Ivy project==

To enable dbdep plugin you must add this snippet on your Apache Ant file (build.xml):

{{{

<!-- ================================= 
      target: Apache Ivy DbDep Plugin             
     ================================= -->
	<taskdef name="ApacheIvyDbDepAntTask" classname="com.sourcesense.ant.dbdep.task.IvyDbDepTask" />
	<target name="ApacheIvyDbDep">
		<ApacheIvyDbDepAntTask 
                        databaseDriverClassName="driver.classname.package.dbms" 
			databaseUrl="jdbc:dbms://ip:port/dbdep" 
			databaseUsername="dbdep" 
			databasePassword="dbdep" 
			ivyFilePath="ivy.xml" 
			environment="YOUR ENVIRONMENT NAME" 
			project="YOUR PROJECT NAME">
		</ApacheIvyDbDepAntTask>
	</target>

}}}
